metadata.title: CVE-2018-20073 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use of extended attributes in downloads in Google Chrome prior to72.0.3626.81 allowed a local attacker to read download URLs via thefilesystem.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
